00040 class MIXIM_API BaseNetwLayer : public BaseLayer
00041 {
00042 private:
00045   BaseNetwLayer(const BaseNetwLayer&);
00048   BaseNetwLayer& operator=(const BaseNetwLayer&);
00049 
00050 public:
00052   enum BaseNetwMessageKinds {
00055     LAST_BASE_NETW_MESSAGE_KIND = 24000,
00056   };
00058   enum BaseNetwControlKinds {
00061     LAST_BASE_NETW_CONTROL_KIND = 24500,
00062   };
00063 
00064 protected:
00069     int headerLength;
00070 
00072     ArpInterface* arp;
00073 
00075     LAddress::L3Type myNetwAddr;
00076 
00078     bool coreDebug;
00079 
00080 public:
00081     //Module_Class_Members(BaseNetwLayer,BaseLayer,0);
00082     BaseNetwLayer() 
00083       : BaseLayer()
00084       , headerLength(0)
00085       , arp(NULL)
00086       , myNetwAddr()
00087       , coreDebug(false)
00088     {}
00089 
00090     BaseNetwLayer(unsigned stacksize) 
00091       : BaseLayer(stacksize)
00092       , headerLength(0)
00093       , arp(NULL)
00094       , myNetwAddr()
00095       , coreDebug(false)
00096     {}
00097 
00099     virtual void initialize(int);
00100 
00101   protected:
00112 
00114     virtual void handleUpperMsg(cMessage* msg);
00115 
00117     virtual void handleLowerMsg(cMessage* msg);
00118 
00120     virtual void handleSelfMsg(cMessage* /*msg*/){
00121       error("BaseNetwLayer does not handle self messages");
00122     };
00123 
00125     virtual void handleLowerControl(cMessage* msg);
00126 
00128     virtual void handleUpperControl(cMessage* /*msg*/){
00129         error("BaseNetwLayer does not handle control messages");
00130     };
00131 
00135     virtual cMessage* decapsMsg(NetwPkt*);
00136 
00138     virtual NetwPkt* encapsMsg(cPacket*);
00139 
00153     virtual cObject* setDownControlInfo(cMessage *const pMsg, const LAddress::L2Type& pDestAddr);
00167     virtual cObject* setUpControlInfo(cMessage *const pMsg, const LAddress::L3Type& pSrcAddr);
